name: Snail Simulator 2019 BETA
description:
Life is hard and painful? Put on your EladioGames™ VR headset and experience of your favorite pet from it's own perspective!

(This game is ironically not compatible with VR)

  • An interactive menu with many gamemodes.
  • Realistic Gameplay. (kinda)
  • Battleroyale up to 2 snails!
  • 7 missions to complete.
  • Haunted houses.
  • Haunted houses burning.
  • And much more!
  • GPU/CPU - TBA
  • HDD - 536MB
  • RAM - 4GB
  • Recommended screen display: 720p or more.

This game is a Beta/Demo of the first area of the game, it's under active development and many bugs can be found, any feedback is very much appreciated.

Also, English is not my native language, if you find some weird translations or typos, please tell me! 

  • (English Beta0.2) WhoDys https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U-HGQlqSATk

-Vsync options doesn't seem to work.

-Some objects don't have a proper hitbox.

-Horror mode: Performance may drop in some PCs when you are running away.

Other stores: Gamejolt

Too much money? Don't worry, I can take care of it and at the same time make my games better. If you want to help please consider checking it out!
